# yandex.ru
User-agent: *
Disallow: /?
Disallow: /403.html
Disallow: /404.html
Disallow: /500.html
Disallow: /about.html
Disallow: /adddata
Disallow: /adresa-segmentator
Disallow: /advanced_engl.html
Disallow: /advertising
Disallow: /all-supported-params
Disallow: /articles
Disallow: /blog/*?text=
Disallow: /blog/*?tag=
Disallow: /blog/*/*/*
Disallow: /blogs*
Allow: /blogs$
Allow: /blogs/$
Allow: /blogs/pad/$
Allow: /blogs/pad$

Disallow: /bus/orders*
Disallow: /bus/api/*

Disallow: /catalog/?text=
Disallow: /cgi-bin/
Disallow: /cgi/
Disallow: /chisla.html
Disallow: /clck
Disallow: /cy

Disallow: /goto_rubric/
Disallow: /i/
Disallow: /images-data
Disallow: /images.html

Allow: /images/smart/$
Allow: /images/touch/$

Disallow: /infected

Disallow: /logotypes

Disallow: /poll/
